!function(){if(window.__vite_is_modern_browser)return;console.warn("vite: loading legacy build because dynamic import or import.meta.url is unsupported, syntax error above should be ignored");var e=document.getElementById("vite-legacy-polyfill"),n=document.createElement("script");n.src= window.__dynamic_base__+e.getAttribute('data-src'),n.onload=function(){System.import( window.__dynamic_base__+document.getElementById('vite-legacy-entry').getAttribute('data-src'))},document.body.appendChild(n)}();
